page.title: 15A TYPICAL FAMILY SUNDAY
page.content: "We wake up at about 9.30 a.m.and go downstairs to have some breakfast.We then get dressed and possibly go to church or go out for the morning. When we get back we usually sit down and watch some T.V.and have a cup of tea or coffee.After coffee we get the lunch ready and sit in the garden.In the summer we often have a Bar-B-Q which is cooked by my Dad.This is usually made up of 2 sausages,1 beef- burger,1 piece of steak and a jacket potato and some salad.After dinner we go out with the band-"Runnymede Brass" in which all of our family play i.e. Keith(Dad),Jean(Mum),Adele(Sister)and myself(aged 12).We usually play from 3 p.m. to 5p.m. and then go home.We have several places where the band play including Thorpe Park,Windsor Safari Park and the Rose and Crown in Thorpe Village". Gary Taylor aged 12 years.
